attributes.action: Reduce the Taxpayer burden by purchasing / leasing a hotel for MPs to use when in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is obvious that non-London based MP's need somewhere to stay when in town on business.

However, with the recent hoo hah about MP's expenses it seems to me that there is a much better, simpler option.

Why not purchase and run or just lease a hotel. Each MP that needs it gets there own permanent room plus space for staff if required. Wireless internet, restaurant and break-out / meeting space to help foster intra-party discussion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
